item.Q:
Write the character:
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname
item.A:
traditional: 時
shí
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character:
to carry (hanging down from the hand); to lift; to put forward; to mention; (upwards character stroke); lifting (brush stroke in painting); a scoop for measuring liquid
item.A:
tí
提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
actually; place; classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc; particle introducing a relative clause or passive
item.A:
suǒ
所以 suǒyǐ therefore; as a result; so

item.Q:
Write the character:
couple; pair; to be opposite; to oppose; to face; for; to; correct (answer); to answer; to reply; to direct (towards sth); right
item.A:
traditional: 對
duì
反对 (反對) fǎnduì to fight against; to oppose; to be opposed to; opposition

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: 11 p.m.-1 a.m.; 1st earthly branch; child; midnight; son; child; seed; egg; small thing
2: (noun suff.)
item.A:
1: zǐ 2: zi
分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction 种子 (種子) zhǒngzi seed

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: earth; ground; field; place; land
2: (used after an adjective or a phrase to form an adverbial adjunct before the verb); -ly
item.A:
1: dì 2: de
地区 (地區) dìqū area; region 暗地里 (暗地裡) àndelǐ secretly; inwardly; on the sly

item.Q:
Write the character:
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
item.A:
traditional: 無
wú
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character:
roots or stems of plants; origin; source; this; the current; root; foundation; basis; (classifier for books, periodicals, files etc)
item.A:
běn
基本 jīběn basic; fundamental; main; elementary

item.Q:
Write the character:
new; newly; abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆; meso- (chem.)
item.A:
xīn
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
to set; to fix; to determine; to decide; to order
item.A:
dìng
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular
